definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: It is speculated that the sediment core is not polluted by thallium at present.
sentences.chinese: 由此推測，該處沉積物當前未受到明顯的鉈污染。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management of occupatioanl acute thallium poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 職業性急性鉈中毒診斷標準及處理原則。

sentences.english: Thallium is a rare hut widely dispersed element.
sentences.chinese: 鉈是一種稀有分散元素。

sentences.english: The rig tong counter-balance line must be inspected at a regular interval.
sentences.chinese: 必須定期檢查大鉗平衡鉈的吊繩。

sentences.english: The paper describes the commercial test on recovering thallium based on the process of extracting cadmium from dust collected by electro-static precipitator (ESP).
sentences.chinese: 介紹了在電塵提鎘工藝基礎上回收鉈的工業試驗。

sentences.english: In ths research, vitro tests of cytotoxicological method was used to evaluate mutagenicity of thallium.
sentences.chinese: 作者用體外實驗方法研究了鉈的細胞誘變作用。

sentences.english: Rig tong line pulley and counterbalances must be inspected at regular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 必須定期檢查大鉗吊繩的滑輪和平衡鉈。

sentences.english: Realgar is the most important mineral of commercial value in the Nanhua As-Tl deposit, Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 雄黃是雲南省南華砷鉈礦牀中最主要工業礦物。

sentences.english: SPECT images were made with Technetium labeled red blood cells.
sentences.chinese: 給她進行了鉈標記紅細胞的SPECT掃描。

sentences.english: Note the cerebral vessels filling with Tc-labeled red cells.
sentences.chinese: 注意有鉈標記紅細胞聚集的大腦血管。

sentences.english: L. The rig tong counterbalance line must be inspected at a regular interval.
sentences.chinese: 必須定期檢查大鉗平衡鉈的吊繩。

sentences.english: Thallium content of chook is also lower than safe edible value.
sentences.chinese: 雞的不同器官中鉈含量均低於鉈的安全食用標準。

sentences.english: Thallium content of chook is also lower than safe edible value.
sentences.chinese: 雞的不同器官中鉈含量均低於鉈的安全食用標準。

definition: a long narrow vessel with two masts
